ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The Bayesian estimation of mixture models (and more general hidden Markov models) suffers from the label switching phenomenon, making the MCMC output non-identifiable. This package can be used in order to deal with this problem using various relabelling algorithms.

The Bayesian estimation of mixture models (and more general hidden Markov models) suffers from the label switching phenomenon, making the MCMC output non-identifiable. This package can be used in order to deal with this problem using various relabelling algorithms.

name: r-label.switching
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.8' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-label.switching
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/label.switching_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/label.switching/label.switching_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d30fe6a15657ca2d9c4cf6b05f12dbdf48ec6fa65c762fc28d2baa4484859c77

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-combinat
    - r-lpsolve
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-combinat
    - r-lpsolve

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('label.switching')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('label.switching')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=label.switching
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: The Bayesian estimation of mixture models (and more general hidden Markov models)
    suffers from the label switching phenomenon, making the MCMC output non-identifiable.
    This package can be used in order to deal with this problem using various relabelling
    algorithms.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: label.switching
# Type: Package
# Title: Relabelling MCMC Outputs of Mixture Models
# Version: 1.8
# Date: 2019-07-01
# Author: Panagiotis Papastamoulis
# Maintainer: Panagiotis Papastamoulis <papapast@yahoo.gr>
# Description: The Bayesian estimation of mixture models (and more general hidden Markov models) suffers from the label switching phenomenon, making the MCMC output non-identifiable. This package can be used in order to deal with this problem using various relabelling algorithms.
# Imports: combinat, lpSolve
# License: GPL-2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-07-01 10:23:21 UTC; panagiotis
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-01 10:50:07 UTC
